Headline: #67 67th/69th/71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/Jeffrey
ShortDescription: 67 67th/69th/71st buses are rerouted in both directions via 67th, Jeffrey, Marquette Drive, South Shore Drive and 67th, due to police activity near 67th/Jeffrey

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Jeffrey, Marquette Drive, South Shore Drive, then resume their normal route on 67th, due to police activity near 67th/Jeffrey.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare- bound Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare- bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Medical District. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare- bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Medical District.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
